sentences.en: As soon as he heard what was afoot, he telephoned his German and Italian counterparts to protest.
sentences.cn: 他一听到在进行中的事，马上就给德国和意大利相应人员打电话抗议。

sentences.en: Deposition is the counterpart of erosion.
Graphite and even its linear counterpart, poly ( p - phenylene ) are too insoluble.
sentences.cn: 石墨甚至其线性类似物, 聚 ( 名聚-苯撑 ) 都是极难溶解的.

sentences.en: Graphite and even its liner counterpart , poly ( p - phenylene ) are too insoluble.
sentences.cn: 石墨甚至其线性类似物聚苯,极不易溶解.

sentences.en: It has no counterpart in the world.
It is not a unique instance , but has its counterpart.
Night is the counterpart of day.
On the political side Murphy and his British counterpart Mr. Harold Marmillar, worked tirelessly.
sentences.cn: 政治方面墨斐与英国附员麦克米兰毫无厌倦地工作着.

sentences.en: The city child's counterpart game, " Arrow Chase ", is an adaptation for sidewalk playing with detective - like overtones.
sentences.cn: 城市孩子在街头玩的类似游戏有 “ 寻觅箭头 ”, 颇含探案的情节与色彩.

sentences.en: The counterpart of this is an excessive longing for some great good.
sentences.cn: 其对立面是一种对某种伟大的善的过份期待.

sentences.en: The Foreign Minister held talks with his Chinese counterpart.
sentences.cn: 外交部长与中国外交部长举行了会谈。

sentences.en: The frequency polygon is simpler than its histogram counterpart.
sentences.cn: 频率多边形比直方图更简单.

sentences.en: The guy running the engineering department wasn't in constant touch with his counterpart in manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 管工程设计部门的人很少同生产部门的负责人取得联系.

sentences.en: This concept of the represented model has no widespread counterpart in the mechanical world.
sentences.cn: 而在机械世界中,并不普遍存在着类似于这种表现模型的概念的情况.

sentences.en: This effect, in analogy to its radiofrequency counterpart, is known as optical rectification.
sentences.cn: 同它的射频对应物相仿, 这种现象称为光学整流.

sentences.en: Your right hand is the counterpart of your left hand.
sentences.cn: 你的右手是你左手的相对物.

words.tran_cn: 副本；配对物；极相似的人或物

trans.tran_cn: 职能（或地位）相当的人，对应的事物
trans.tran_en: Someone's or something's counterpart is another person or thing that has a similar function or position in a different place
